definitions.definition: The fifth major tone of a musical scale (five major steps above the note in question); thus G is the dominant of C, A of D, and so on.
The triad built on the dominant tone.
A species or organism that is dominant.
(BDSM) The dominating partner in sadomasochistic sexual activity.

definitions.example: The dominant party controlled the government.

definitions.definition: Predominant, common, prevalent, of greatest importance.
definitions.example: The dominant plants of the Carboniferous were lycopods and early conifers.

definitions.definition: Designating the follicle which will survive atresia and permit ovulation.
